articles.title: CMS Info Systems logs 48% growth in December quarter net at Rs 60 crore
articles.description: The city-based company said its annualised revenue rose 21.4 percent to Rs 40.37 crore driven by growth across both cash management and managed services businesses. Its earnings per share for the quarter was Rs 4.07, higher by 48 percent.
